analysis.description:
Elrond.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x68bbbfdef63912ebbee633b4836634ed8a6b2639.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x68bbbfdef63912ebbee633b4836634ed8a6b2639.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x68bbbfdef63912ebbee633b4836634ed8a6b2639.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x68bbbfdef63912ebbee633b4836634ed8a6b2639.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x68bbbfdef63912ebbee633b4836634ed8a6b2639.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
